user_query: grandmother's story, and she appears as a character with various settings As you can see from the story "Marriage is nothing more than" Cinder also has a very strong antipathy to other elements, and after Ember finds out that she's close to Wade, she shows a very dislike. However, director Peter Sohn said that when expressing the characters, they did not only express Korean elements, but also refer to all cultures that might feel unfamiliar in the United States Because of his love for firecrackers and redness, fire elements are also characterized by Chinese elements Wade Ripple is the leading male character in Elemental and a young water element character who always shows a lively feeling The name Wade means walking in the water, and the surname Ripple means a wave, and the name means a water element character Wade's character was created using water balloons as a reference, but if you slow down the movement, it looks like the jelly is moving, so it's not produced at a slow pace I'm afraid if I make it fast, it'll look like a rubber ball, so I've done a lot of simulations to find the right speed But the thing that made Wade the most difficult for the crew was that Wade's head was made up of water, and it was shaking around But I couldn't express the water shaking here and there, but I couldn't show too much distraction, so I did a lot of work to give only the right movement when I was working on his hair When we tested Wade's lighting, we made the character look transparent

entities.entity_description: Elemental은 불과 물 원소 캐릭터들의 이야기를 다룬 애니메이션 영화이다
Peter Sohn은 Elemental의 감독으로, 캐릭터 표현 시 한국 요소뿐만 아니라 미국에서 낯설게 느껴질 수 있는 모든 문화를 참고했다고 밝혔다
Ember는 Elemental의 불 원소 캐릭터로, 할머니의 이야기와 다양한 설정을 가진 캐릭터이며, 결혼에 대한 강한 반감을 가지고 있고 Wade와 가까워지는 것을 싫어하는 모습을 보인다
Wade Ripple은 Elemental의 남자 주인공으로, 항상 활기찬 느낌을 보여주는 젊은 물 원소 캐릭터이다. 이름 Wade는 물속을 걷는다는 의미이고, 성 Ripple은 파도를 의미한다. 물풍선을 참고하여 만들어졌으며, 머리가 물로 이루어져 있어 제작진이 가장 어려워했던 캐릭터이다
Cinder는 Elemental의 캐릭터로, 다른 요소들에 대해 매우 강한 반감을 가지고 있으며 Ember가 Wade와 가까워지는 것을 알게 된 후 매우 싫어하는 모습을 보인다

relationships.relationship_description: Ember와 Wade는 서로 가까워지는 관계로, Ember가 Wade와 가까워지는 것이 이야기의 중요한 요소이다
Cinder는 Ember가 Wade와 가까워지는 것을 싫어한다
Cinder는 Ember가 Wade와 가까워지는 것에 대해 반감을 보인다
